actions.committee: Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to liberalize eligibility for cost-of-living increases in civil service retirement annuities.

summary.text: Allows Federal employees eligible for retirement under the Civil Service retirement system before a cost-of-living annuity increase goes into effect to retire after that date and still have included in the computation of their annuities that cost of living increase. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8340)

titles.title: A bill to liberalize eligibility for cost-of-living increases in civil service retirement annuities.
